website_summaries.verdict: Modern style and design that make this chair a focal point in any room. Great for high-end fashion and design styles.
pros: Extra cushion in the seated position
Separate individual cushions provide plenty of support in both positions
cons: Space in the laid-back position is limited

customer_reviews.title: Low Price And Well Made!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this along with the Chaise Lounge and Couch Futons. All were very easy to assemble. I was on a short budget to fill my living room and all of these items did the trick. All are very firm, durable, well made, and quite fashionable. The way the legs, tools, and instructions were stored in a zippered compartment underneath each item was quite innovative as I had never seen that kind of inclusion before. I would highly recommend these to anyone looking for an economic way to fill a living room!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Stiff but Workable
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is pretty uncomfortable like others have said. It's very stiff. I've added some cushions to the back and put a throw over the seat of it so that it is a wee bit softer. It looks really good though and fits nicely where I needed it. It's pretty cheap, so I guess it gets the job done. It was very easy to put together and transforms easily as a futon.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: lumpy
customer_reviews.text: got as a set for the basement, easy assembly, and very sturdy. They stay up or recline easily. But oh my gosh are they uncomfortable. your butt hurts after sitting on them. Doesnt seen to phase teens?? But for me I would rather sit on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: For paying very little for a chair you get a ok chair. It isn't very comfortable. The frame of the chair protrudes from the chair when you sit on it, could use more filling.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Stylish piece for light use
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and cute. Looks great in my office, but wouldn't recommend for heavy use. It's very stiff and the fabric feels a little thin.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Looks great in my living room. Bought with the matching couch and chairs longer. It’s durable, which I needed because I have kids and a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, great levels of recline. I love the color and fabric. It looks chic. Love this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not for sitting
customer_reviews.text: can not seat on it for too long you will experience body pain.... and it sink you in
customer_reviews.author: arleen

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but a little firm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a sitting room. Well made and very attractive. Extremely firm.
customer_reviews.author: jillpill

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good to have a sofa chair like this in ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good to have a sofa chair like this in this price. Very easy to assemble and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s very great and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s really great it’s not that stuff has a little bounce to it and it’s very good
customer_reviews.author: gabino deluna

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This item was shipped and delivered quickly. I am 100% satisfied with the quality of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Janete

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable and very professional
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly for the office. It is comfortable and very professional!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: It met my view in niceness but ended up being ...
customer_reviews.text: It met my view in niceness but ended up being to small for my niece to sleep on. So we use it to just sit on in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: james e troup

customer_reviews.title: Sewing defect
customer_reviews.text: The product came with a sewing defect. We changed for a new one but came with the same problem...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair about a year ago. I couldn't believe how inexpensive it was. We love it! Its perfect for our front room. It's really easy to wipe down! My kids have gotten all kind of stuff on it and it still looks new. The only down to it is the back chair legs don't stay screwed in very well and when they get really loose it starts making like a bell ringing sounds when any type of vibration happens(working by, kid jumping). I would definitely recommend though if you're looking for a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: jayne_haz

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the quality, value and versatility of this chair. We purchased the grey one for my teenage daughters room and it is perfect for lounging to read and watch TV. The only downside is that it is too short to actually sleep on but the dimensions reflect that so it is not a shock.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

product_meta.title: DHP Emily Accent Chair with Split-Back and Chrome Legs, Grey Linen
product_meta.description: Color:GrayAdd this unique accent chair to any room for a touch of modern that ties your décor together. The tufted back and seating add a sophisticated look, with striking angled chrome legs that give a glimmer of brilliance. Can be conveniently opened for a lounging experience, plus paired with the Emily convertible futon or Emily chaise lounger for extra seating and sleeping space.
feature_bullets: Modern look with squared tufted design and slanted chrome legs
Multifunctional piece: split-back adjusts to suit your needs from sitting to lounging
Combine with matching futon for additional seating and sleeping space
